name: MusiDark
description: Dark theme for https://musi.sh/ a web client for Apple Music.
additional_info:
Changelog:

2019-08-30: Fix backgrounds on artist pages, attempt to stop unreadable search text (failed), new update coming soon with more fixes. 2019-08-22: Fix background of artists in search 2019-08-18: Fix colouring on hover for album art, fix background colours of album art, alter sizing of right click behaviours, etc. 2019-08-17: Make all scrollers background color, alter behaviour to introduce hovers, fix bugs, make scrollers "just work", general cleanup, define scrollbar colour, fix annoying lines seperating songs, fix volume slider color, fix settings color, fix search color, etc. 2019-08-03: Alter Austin Barrett's "Musish OLED Black" style to make work on new version of musi.sh
